description:
Split decison 1 of 2 Refused: 
 T1 Lime - Reduce to most recent pruning points.
 T2 Tulip Tree -  Reduce to most recent pruning points.
 Split decison 2 of 2 Granted: 
 T5 Norway Maple - Lift canopy by removing x 2 lowest branches over lawn, x 2 lowest branches growing towards the Swedish Birch and x 2 lowest branches growing towards the main gates. 
 T6 Swedish Birch - Thin and clean out crown, remove deadwood, weak and suppressed branches. Lift canopy all round by 1-2m, balance crown. 
 T8 Pillar Cherry -  Clean out crown, remove deadwood, weak and suppressed branches. Prune back overlong outer branches by 0.5-1m to contain spread and lessen weight. Lift and balance crown. 
 T9 Copper Beech - Lift canopy all round by 1-2m and level off 'browse line'. Clean out crown, remove deadwood, weak and suppressed branches and suckers. Prune back lateral spread to clear Amelanchier street tree by 2m. 
 T10 Pillar Apple - Lift canopy all round by 1-2m to improve clearance. Clean out crown, remove deadwood and suckers. 
 T11 Pillar Apple - Lift canopy all round by 1-2m to improve clearance. Clean out crown, remove deadwood and suckers. Remove lowest outer layer of lateral branches. 
 T12 Lime Large mature very dense tree. To contain spread and improve light and space all round and improve condition and visual appearance: Reduce lateral crown spread all round by 1-2m to suitable new growing points. Thin and clean out crown, remove all deadwood, dieback, weak and suppressed growth and suckers. Lift canopy all round by up to 2m to improve clearance and balance
